rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information using the verb 'affected' which is not high-potency.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This reports a fact about a case location but contains no explicit calming cue.
'only aware of one affected house... which is one of the thousands of farms' uses minimiser with explicit scale contrast for reassurance.
